briefdescription.para: Format template using std::format syntax.
Pointer to the underlying text renderable. Not owned.
Current numeric value to display.
True if the text content needs to be updated.
True if the AABB bounds need to be recalculated.
Whether this component is enabled.
Checks whether this component is enabled.
Enables this component.
Disables this component.
Constructs a UiTextComponent with the given renderable.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the TextRenderable. Must not be nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Copy constructor.
Returns the underlying text renderable as const pointer.

simplesect.para: Const pointer to the TextRenderable. Never nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Returns the underlying text renderable as a pointer.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the TextRenderable. Never nullptr.

briefdescription.para: Sets the format template.

detaileddescription.para: Uses std::format syntax. The value is inserted at `{0}`.

briefdescription.para: Resets the component to its initial state.
Updates the text content if dirty.

detaileddescription.para: Applies the template to the current value and updates the renderable.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the AABB bounds need recalculation.

simplesect.para: True if a resize is needed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Marks the resize as complete.
Sets the numeric value to display.

detaileddescription.para: Triggers an update if the value has changed.

briefdescription.para: Component for displaying formatted text in the UI.

detaileddescription.para: Wraps a TextRenderable and provides template-based value formatting. Supports dirty tracking to minimize rendering updates.
